```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
fire <- read.csv("forestfires.csv")
```


```{r}
head(fire)
```


```{r}
str(fire)

summary(fire)
```

```{r}
#ggpairs(fire)
```

```{r}
fire <- fire %>% mutate(month = as.factor(month),
                day = as.factor(day))
```
```{r}
# Reponse area (multiple regression)
lm.fit <- lm(area ~ ., data = fire )
summary(lm.fit)

par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(lm.fit)
```

```{r}
# Binary area
fire <- fire %>% 
  mutate(binary_area = if_else(area != 0, "Not zero", "Zero")) %>% 
  mutate(binary_area = as.factor(binary_area))

glm.fit <- glm(binary_area ~ ., family = "binomial", data = fire %>% select(-area))
summary(glm.fit)
```
